description:
Summary score for the PROMIS Sleep Disturbance instrument, which measures perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep.

Each item ranges from 1 to 5. The total score is derived by summing all 8 items and higher scores indicate more severe symptoms. [Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)
